oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special Orders No. 54
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Special Orders No. 54 appointing a military commission to convene at the Pulaski courthouse for "the trial of persons as may be properly brought before it." Maj. C. H. Bures, 16th Ill. Cav., Capt. Erwin Ellis, 8th Mich. Cav., Capt. Joseph Hasty, 6th Ind. Cav., First Lt. A. M. Staats, 6th Ind. Cav., and 2nd Lt. A. Allen, 16th Ill. Cav. were each appointed as a detail for the Commission. First Lt. J. P. Ryford, 8th Mich. Cav. Regt., was appointed Judge Advocate and Recorder of the Commission.
